creator: Laurence2389

title: Insert Link freezes randomly
content:
I use insert link all the time and it will work great for weeks and then randomly freezes. I have read so many threads about Band-Aid solutions for this as it seems to be a well established problem - so come one TB- solve it so it doesn't happen!! Anyway these are the solutions that have worked best for me

  1. Use the esc key when your email freezes - this unfreezes the email instead of having to force close thunderbird - and then you can chose to paste the http link instead of insert.
  2. If you have two screens - move your email to the opposite screen and try again - I found that the link screen dialogue box seems to have a preferred space between itself and the email (so incongruous)
  3. Click Alt+spacebar to open the move dialogue box which allows you to move the email and sometime reset the location of the link dialogue box
  4. Turn off hardware acceleration in settings general (at the bottom)
  5. close thunderbird and open in safe mode by holding shift whist clicking TB. at the prompt: 'Reset toolbars & controls', 'Make changes & restart'.

But this should not be an ongoing problem - its super annoying and needs to be addressed
creator: leanne3

title: Thunderbird casn not connect to gmail anylonger since Nov 12, 2024
content:
Thunderbird stopped connecting to our Gmail account. All authentication configs incl. Oauth2 are unchanged. Nonetheless, first SMTP stopped working and get time outs, now IMAP is dead too. What is going on? We can't get it back to work. We switched VPN (NordVPN) and Antivirus (Norton) off, no change.

Urgent help please

title: Thunderbird fails to connect ad authentify to Gmail account
content:
This is getting completely ridicolous! First SMPT failed to connect, than IMAP stopped working with our years old perfect working OAuth2 config. So we deleted in the end the program. re-installed the latest version of Thunderbird and tried to reconnect our Gmail account with our user/password (both 1000% correct!!), all on Oauth2 according to your help, but nothing works, simply getting error message that either config, user or password are incorrect.

Hi guys, what is going on? This our business account, and we URGENTLY need it up and running again. Please HELP!
creator: heavenofsoundsingingbowls
